page.title: 11DUNSTON-GOOD PLACE TO LIVE?
page.content: A lot of the people we interviewed like living in Dunston because it is {friendly}and they have many friends. they were born here and it has handy amentiies. There are lots of shops and you don't have to travel,but if you want to go to Newcastle it is not far and there is good transport.The {railway line}has just reopened and you can now get a train to Newcastle. Some of the older people were asked "If they would like to move?",they said "No,because it is harder to make friends when you're older and it would be like a new world to them". Many young people said "They would move because there are{no jobs in Dunston." A lot of people don't like all of the graffiti. One person thought it wasn't safe for old people to go out at night."Nobody was frightened in the old days."
